queries.query: SELECT id, path, name, access FROM shares
INSERT INTO shares(path, name, access) values ('${path}', '${name}', ${access})
SELECT id, path, name, access FROM shares WHERE id = ${id}
SELECT users.id, users.login, users.password FROM users INNER JOIN user_share on users.id = user_share.id_user INNER JOIN shares on shares.id = user_share.id_share WHERE shares.id = ${id}
